column4: When I run python in Interactive Mode on the terminal, it won't run certain commands, such as gmtime(), random(), etc.
it says that they are not found.
there are commands that I am sure exist in Python (I've run them in Windows), but aren't found in my linux library, for some reason.
you might need the dev packages?
- I've installed the dev packages, as well.  from the synaptics package manager.
